definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: min2 zu2 zhu3 yi4 qing2 xu4

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺與其說是民族主義不如說是愛國心。

sentences.english: These nationalisms, or tribalisms vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 這些民族主義或部落主義大相徑庭。

sentences.english: Banning the representation of an enemy is imposing nationalism on entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 限制敵人代表是在娛樂遊戲中強加民族主義。

sentences.english: Nationalism literary thoughts is one of major phenomena in Orient literature of 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 民族主義文學思潮是20世紀東方文學的重要現象。

sentences.english: Marx was opposed to all claims of nationalism and chauvinism.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思反對一切民族主義和沙文主義的論調。

sentences.english: When things don't go well, most people become nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 當事情不順利的時候，多數人會變得民族主義。

sentences.english: Now, China wants to tamp such nationalism down.
sentences.chinese: 現在，中國希望壓制民族主義。

sentences.english: Many Serbs are affiliated to small ultranationalist groups.
sentences.chinese: 很多塞爾維亞人屬於小型極端民族主義組織成員。

sentences.english: In both countries, a nationalist fringe will be nettled .
sentences.chinese: 但是在這兩個國家，民族主義情緒都將會被激起。

sentences.english: The key is that it has been related to the nationalist thought of the national rise and decline.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是它已與國家興亡的民族主義思想系在一起了。

sentences.english: I do not know how to escape from the strait-jacket of political nationalism.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我不知道如何擺脫政治民族主義的束縛。

sentences.english: In the Arab world, nationalism has too often been a clipped currency.
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉伯世界，民族主義經常是一種短促的潮流。

sentences.english: And it should reign in Chinese nationalism.
sentences.chinese: 而且它應該抑制中國的民族主義。

sentences.english: The second part has discussed the content of Li Liejun's nationalist thought.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分論述了李烈鈞民族主義思想的主要內容。

sentences.english: WHEN nationalism rears its head in China, the country’s neighbours tremble.
sentences.chinese: 當民族主義在中國擡頭，其鄰國就開始顫抖。

sentences.english: He was one of the earliest apostles of collectivistic nationalism in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 他是德國最早的集體主義的民族主義的傳道者之一。

definition: Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
